description.value: When the character makes a melee attack as part of a Charge Action or Crushing Charge Mounted Special Action, their attack gains Felling(Weapon Skill Bonus/2), rounded up. Additionally, when character makes a melee attack as part of a Crushing Charge Mounted Special Action, they deal additional damage equal to the Mount's Strength Bonus.
